title: Seeing Through
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Nozomi-san, Nozomi-san. I heard it from Hanamaru-chan, but is it true that you’re an expert counselor, Nozomi-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eeh!? That’s the first time I’ve heard that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Because Hanamaru-chan said that she felt better after she consulted you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Is that so? I’m glad Hanamaru-chan felt better…. But I’m not really an expert or anything like that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I see….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>While I might not be an expert, I know a good way to solve your problem right now, Chikacchi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeh!? Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah. If you’re torn between getting a choco banana and a strawberry whipped cream crepes, we can just share half of each♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeh!? How did you know!? How, how!? Nozomi-san, you’re amazing!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I wonder how~. Don’t sweat the details, let’s go buy the crepes<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
